channel.title: Reflection on Hiya Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Hiya Notes

item.title: The Road Not Taken
item.description:
Two roads diverged in a yellow wood.

I first encountered Robert Frost’s poem The Road Not Taken ten years ago, but only now do I feel its meaning.

Starting this blog feels like standing at the fork of a path. One road is safe, familiar, predictable. The other is uncertain, quiet, and deeply personal.

I choose this space as my “road less traveled.”

This blog is not meant to be perfect.
It is meant to be unique and personal.
